lead_paragraph: Mr. Holt often held back during the debate, allowing the two candidates to bicker, but he did reject Donald J. Trump’s claim that he opposed the Iraq war.

headline.print_headline: Holt of NBC Opted for Showing Restraint, Not Driving the Candidates’ Discussion
headline.main: Lester Holt, Given a Choice Assignment, Opted for Restraint

snippet: Mr. Holt often held back during the debate, allowing the two candidates to bicker, but he did reject Donald J. Trump’s claim that he opposed the Iraq war....
abstract: NBC news anchor Lester Holt was generally reticent as moderator at first presidential debate, allowing Hillary Clinton and Donald J Trump to battle between themselves; his restraint seemed crafted to eschew controversy that hit colleague Matt Lauer following performance at forum in early September.
